docs.text: Diagrams ¶ Overview ¶ xkcd styled chart xkcd : A webcomic of romance, sarcasm, math, and language. xkcd styled chart lib Inkscape is a professional vector graphics editor for Windows, Mac OS X and Linux. It's free and open source. InkscapeForum extensions Inkscape Table Support Dia Diagram Editor Diagram Designer : Simple vector graphics editor for creating flowcharts, UML class diagrams, illustrations and slide shows. Xfig is an interactive drawing tool which runs under X Window System Version 11 Release 4 (X11R4) or later, on most UNIX-compatible platforms, and e.g. under Darwin on the MacIntosh and any X server under Microsoft Windows. It is freeware, and can be downloaded freely Edraw : Creating flow chart, mind map, org charts, network diagrams and floor plans with rich gallery of examples and templates Online Tools ¶ Google Diagram (draw.io) ProcessOn Draw Anywhere : Create diagrams online. No download, no-install! WebSequenceDiagrams Creating Graphics Programmatically ¶ Mermaid GraphViz GraphViz Pocket Reference GraphViz User Guide Asymptote: The Vector Graphics Language Mind Map ¶ 15款最好用的思维导图（心智图 ）工具 XMind ¶ XMind , a full-featured mind mapping and brainstorming tool, designed to generate ideas, inspire creativity, brings you efficiency both in work and life. Tens of million people love it. MindManager ¶ http://www.mindmanager.cn/ FreeMind ¶ FreeMind is a premier free mind-mapping software written in Java Free Ur Mind-推荐使用FreeMind工具 解决 Freemind 中文字体乱码 由于 Freemind 要应用到 Java 运行时环境，显示中文字体乱码是由于 JRE 的字体造成的，所以更改 JRE 的字体即可。找一个可用于中文显示的字体，比如： wqy 字体，这里采用增黑。 确认字体已经安装于系统，我的系统增黑字体安装于： Text Only /usr/share/fonts/truetype/wqy/wqy-zenhei.ttf 找到 JRE 的字体目录，位于： Text Only /usr/lib/jvm/java-6-sun/jre/lib/fonts/ 创建字体目录： Bash cd /usr/lib/jvm/java-6-sun/jre/lib/fonts/ sudo mkdir fallback sudo ln -s /usr/share/fonts/truetype/wqy/wqy-zenhei.ttf wqy-zenhei.ttf sudo mkfontdir sudo mkfontscale 重启 Freemind 即可 iMindMap ¶ https://imindmap.com/zh-cn/ Online ¶ 百度脑图 极速灵感 MyMind

It's free and open source. InkscapeForum extensions Inkscape Table Support Dia Diagram Editor Diagram Designer : Simple vector graphics editor for creating flowcharts, UML class diagrams, illustrations and slide shows. Xfig is an interactive drawing tool which runs under X Window System Version 11 Release 4 (X11R4) or later, on most UNIX-compatible platforms, and e.g. under Darwin on the MacIntosh and any X server under Microsoft Windows. It is freeware, and can be downloaded freely Edraw : Creating flow chart, mind map, org charts, network diagrams and floor plans with rich gallery of examples and templates

docs.text: FreeMind is a premier free mind-mapping software written in Java Free Ur Mind-推荐使用FreeMind工具 解决 Freemind 中文字体乱码 由于 Freemind 要应用到 Java 运行时环境，显示中文字体乱码是由于 JRE 的字体造成的，所以更改 JRE 的字体即可。找一个可用于中文显示的字体，比如： wqy 字体，这里采用增黑。 确认字体已经安装于系统，我的系统增黑字体安装于： Text Only /usr/share/fonts/truetype/wqy/wqy-zenhei.ttf 找到 JRE 的字体目录，位于： Text Only /usr/lib/jvm/java-6-sun/jre/lib/fonts/ 创建字体目录： Bash cd /usr/lib/jvm/java-6-sun/jre/lib/fonts/ sudo mkdir fallback sudo ln -s /usr/share/fonts/truetype/wqy/wqy-zenhei.ttf wqy-zenhei.ttf sudo mkfontdir sudo mkfontscale 重启 Freemind 即可

docs.text: Math Graphics ¶ Overview ¶ 如何在论文中画出漂亮的插图？ Online Tools ¶ Viz.js : Graphviz in your browser Google Diagrams (drawio) ¶ https://www.diagrams.net/ Use mathematical typesetting in diagrams GeoGebra ¶ GeoGebra : free online math tools for graphing, geometry, 3D, and more desmos ¶ Desmos : Graph functions, plot data, evaluate equations, explore transformations, and much more Python matplotlib ¶ Daft is a Python package that uses matplotlib to render pixel-perfect probabilistic graphical models for publication in a journal or on the internet. TeX with Math Graphics ¶ jPicEdt The Ipe extensible drawing editor MetaPost (TUG) TikZ & PGF ¶ Latex--TikZ和PGF--高级文本绘图，思维绘图，想到--得到！ TikZ and PGF are TeX packages for creating graphics programmatically TikzEdt is a combined WYSIWYG/text editor designed for editing Tikz code matlab2tikz/matlab2tikz : converts MATLAB®/Octave figures to TikZ/pgfplots figures for smooth integration into LaTeX tikz-bayesnet : TikZ library for drawing Bayesian networks, graphical models and (directed) factor graphs in LaTeX. with Inkscape svg2tikz : a set of tools for converting SVG graphics to TikZ/PGF code TexText : Re-editable LaTeX graphics for Inkscape Data Analysis & Graphing ¶ QtiPlot is a cross platform data analysis and scientific visualisation solution OriginLab - Data Analysis and Graphing Software D3.js is a JavaScript library for manipulating documents based on data Circos is a software package for visualizing data and information gnuplot ¶ gnuplot homepage gnuplot 让您的数据可视化

docs.text: Latex--TikZ和PGF--高级文本绘图，思维绘图，想到--得到！ TikZ and PGF are TeX packages for creating graphics programmatically TikzEdt is a combined WYSIWYG/text editor designed for editing Tikz code matlab2tikz/matlab2tikz : converts MATLAB®/Octave figures to TikZ/pgfplots figures for smooth integration into LaTeX tikz-bayesnet : TikZ library for drawing Bayesian networks, graphical models and (directed) factor graphs in LaTeX. with Inkscape svg2tikz : a set of tools for converting SVG graphics to TikZ/PGF code TexText : Re-editable LaTeX graphics for Inkscape
